description.displayText:
To Whom It May Concern,

Hayley is a responsible, compassionate individual who performs her job as a Home Attendant very nicely.

Hayley has a great sense of humor, which makes her fun to be around.

Hayley performs every single task that is given to her and I would certainly recommend her home skilled services as a Home Attendant.

If you have any questions, you can contact me.

Thank you.

description.displayText: Hayley was fantastic with my dad when he needed additional care and help. She went out if her way for him and truly cared in addition to being fully qualified and experienced in all the necessary tasks caring for him. I would not hesitate to recommend her to anyone in need of home help for themselves or a loved on.

She went out if her way for him and truly cared in addition to being fully qualified and experienced in all the necessary tasks caring for him. I would not hesitate to recommend her to anyone in need of home help for themselves or a loved on.

description.displayText: I wholeheartedly and unequivocally recommend Hayley as a senior caregiver.  We hired her to care for my 100 year-old grandmother, who was living alone in her home and had both physical and cognitive impairments.  Hayley worked with her until she required 24-hour care and went into a facility.  To say my grandmother was difficult and uncooperative is an understatement.  Through it all, Hayley was patient, kind, professional, warm, honest, and reliable.  She kept my grandmother's home spotless, and went above and beyond, doing more than anyone asked of her, always with a calm and empathetic demeanor.  I wish her all the best, and any family would be fortunate to hire her.

description.displayText: Haley was a compassionate, caring, competent and supportive caregiver for my dad and our family. We love her!
description.originalText: Haley was a compassionate, caring, competent and supportive caregiver for my dad and our family. We love her!

description.displayText: Hayley is a dream. A smart, caring, devoted, loyal dream. You can't do better for your loved one. She treated my "challenging" uncle with kindness and compassion. He adored her and he adores almost no one! She's really one of a kind -- I can't recommend her enough.
description.originalText: Hayley is a dream. A smart, caring, devoted, loyal dream. You can't do better for your loved one. She treated my "challenging" uncle with kindness and compassion. He adored her and he adores almost no one! She's really one of a kind -- I can't recommend her enough.

description.displayText:
It is my immense pleasure and honor to recommend Hayley for a caregiver position. 

Having utilized her services for over five years, I can fully vouch for her suitability and ability to work in this capacity.

My elderly mother wanted to live independently in her home of over 50 years, and this was made possible by enlisting the services provided by Hayley.

What started out as an employer-employee relationship blossomed into a real friendship based upon mutual admiration, respect and love. Hayley became a member of our family, and always acted in my mother's best interests.

She was always dependable, diligent and honest, and displayed unbelievable patience with an often difficult client. 

Hayley provided an extensive array of services, including cooking, light housekeeping, shopping, and personal care. She did all that was requested or needed, and more, and did it all well. 

My mother's quality of life and independence was greatly improved and enhanced by Hayley, and she was able to live independently until her recent death at almost 100 years old.

Our family will always be grateful to Hayley's for her care and love of our mother.

description.displayText: Hayley lived with us for 13 months. She took care of my father who was bed ridden. She is a wonderful person and very dedicated. My father was very happy having her taking care of him. She made sure, he ate at least 3 times a day. She bathed him everyday and changed the bed everyday. She also sang to him all the time and he loved it.
